m64tweak.description:
Changes the .m64 data location. Default Location: 007B0860 Location used by most SM64 Editor Versions: 03E00000
Credit to Blake.
m64tweak.patch:
D476A: [16, "Part 1 (DEFAULT: 007B)", hex] D4772: [16, "Part 2 (DEFAULT: 0860)", hex] D4786: [copy, D476A, D476C] D478A: [copy, D4772, D4774]
//For XXXXXXXX, change the value to place you want the .m64 data to go XXXXXXXX: [copy, 7B0860, 7CC6C0]
